alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Dust Advisory issued August 17 at 7:28PM MST until August 17 at 8:30PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 830 PM MST. * At 728 PM MST, a wall of dust was along a line extending from Arizona City to 6 miles west of Casa Grande to near Olberg to near Sun Lakes to Chandler Fashion Center Mall, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Less than one mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. * This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 159 and 175, and between mile markers 193 and 204. AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 144 and 178. AZ Route 202 between mile markers 50 and 55. Locations impacted include... Chandler, Tempe, Casa Grande, Sun Lakes, Maricopa, Arizona City, Toltec, South Mountain Park, Bapchule, Estrella Sailport, Olberg, Chandler Fashion Center Mall, Arizola, Firebird Lake and Mobile. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust brings reduced visibility, leading to dangerous driving conditions. If driving, avoid blowing dust if possible. If caught in dense blowing dust, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
